name: 3 In 1: Sudoku, Mahjong, MineSweeper
summary: Treat yourself to three classic games: Sudoku, Mahjong, and Minesweeper. Each game features different levels of difficulty, many levels, and a beautiful game environment. All three games require logic and strategy. Sudoku is the game where you must get numbers in sequential order without repeating a number. Mahjong is the classic game of grouping similar tiles. Minesweeper is the original computer game where you must carefully pinpoint the location of mines through logic and the process of elimination.
